# **Foundations of Quantitative Reasoning (BIO381)**

#### Dr. Easton R White 
#### Fall 2019 
#### University Of Vermont

<br><br><br><br>

Welcome to the [QuEST](https://www.uvm.edu/quest) Foundations of Quantitative Reasoning course. This course is designed to provide students with a solid background in both ecology and evolution as well as commonly used quantitative tools. This website will be updated throughout the semester. The [Schedule](https://erwhite1.github.io/QuantReasoning/schedule.html) tab lists the topics covered and links to lecture material, assignments, and required readings.

All the materials for this course are open-source on [Github](https://github.com/erwhite1/QuantReasoning). Please drop Easton an email (Easton.White@uvm.edu) if you are interested in using the course materials.
